course.subject: ELEC
course.name: High Frequency Circuit Design
course.description: High frequency circuit design for wireless applications.  S-parameters, front-end amp, VCO, PLL, power amplifier, and integration issues will be covered.

reviews.author: ZCy
reviews.comment_content: Require CMOS circuit design and RF design background. Many design software are used, including the circuit design and EM simulation.
reviews.comment_teaching: Based on the PPT, and still require enough background to understand the contents.
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is mainly based on the assignments and the final project. The TA is actually the one who spends a lot of time for software settings.
reviews.comment_workload: Assignments and projects are useful but not easy to finish. The assignment can also be a small project, e.g., to design a mixer or LNA. The final project is a group work which is comprised of 2~3 people.
